title: Ep 103: Best Intentions with Chemist Confessions
itunes:title: Ep 103: Best Intentions with Chemist Confessions
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate ring in the new year by going through their intentions for 2020. Then they welcome Victoria Fu and Gloria Lu, co-founders of Chemist Confessions, to the podcast. They answer tons of listener questions about skincare, share how their care...
description:
Doree and Kate ring in the new year by going through their intentions for 2020. Then they welcome Victoria Fu and Gloria Lu, co-founders of Chemist Confessions, to the podcast. They answer tons of listener questions about skincare, share how their careers as scientists led them to start their site, and discuss what inspired them to make their own skincare line.


We love to hear from you! To leave a voicemail, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Fabletics - Get 2 leggings for only $24 when you go to fabletics.com/forever35.
  • KIND - Visit kindsnacks.com/forever35 to create your own custom variety pack, and get 2 free KIND Minis® with your order when you use code FOREVER35 in your shopping cart.
  • ThirdLove - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • Joybird - Head to joybird.com/forever35 for 25% off your first order with promo code FOREVER35.
  • Molekule - Use code FOREVER10 at checkout to get 10% off your first air purifier order at molekule.com.
  • Prose - Visit prose.com/forever35 for a free consultation and 20% off.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
